attributes.action: To give John Bercow a peerage
attributes.additional_details:
Since Brexit began, it has been the speakers position to maintain order, and give time to speakers across the house of commons, creating a balanced debate. 
John Bercow has maintained this better than any other individual in recent history.
If anyone deserves a peerage it is he.
attributes.background: John Bercow deserves a peerage for the most challanging position in government service in recent history.
